### 一些直观的时间序列

```{r warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
library(fpp2)
library(ggfortify)
autoplot(gold, ts.colour = 'red', ts.linetype = 'dashed')
frequency(woolyrnq)
frequency(gas)


autoplot(melsyd[,"Economy.Class"]) +
  ggtitle("墨尔本 - 悉尼经济舱乘客客流量") +
  xlab("年份") +
  ylab("千")+
  theme(text = element_text(family = "STHeiti"))+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```

### 周期性
```{r}
autoplot(AirPassengers )
autoplot(arrivals, facets = TRUE)
autoplot(arrivals, facets = TRUE) +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(title ="到澳大利亚旅客人数",
       y = "Arrivals (in thousands)",
       x = NULL)
```
## 季节性
```{r}
ggseasonplot(a10, year.labels=TRUE, year.labels.left=TRUE) +
  xlab("月份")+
  ylab("百万（美元）") +
  ggtitle("季节图：降糖药物销量")+
  theme(text = element_text(family = "STHeiti"))+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
ggseasonplot(a10, polar=TRUE) +
  xlab("月份")+
  ylab("百万（美元）") +
  ggtitle("极坐标季节图：降糖药物销量")+
  theme(text = element_text(family = "STHeiti"))+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```

```{r}
library(stats)
autoplot(stl(AirPassengers, s.window = 'periodic'), ts.colour = 'blue')
```
```{r}
autoplot(stl(a10,s.window = 'periodic'),ts.colour = 'red')
```
